item.title: Eastern Tennessee Gets Lit for Business Fiber Optic Service
item.description:
Nashville, Tennessee, is known for its robust fiber optic network infrastructure. The city’s thriving business sector, particularly in healthcare, publishing, banking, transportation, and music, demands high bandwidth, a need that extends across the state. EarthLink, a leading bandwidth provider, has recently expanded its fiber optic network in eastern Tennessee. The project includes a 343-mile route connecting Nashville to Knoxville, with additional routes linking Knoxville to Chattanooga and Bristol. This network offers connection points in multiple cities, including Cookeville, Oak Ridge, and Cleveland, and major Points of Presence (PoPs) in Knoxville, Morristown, Johnson City, and Bristol...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/eastern-tennessee-gets-lit-for-business-fiber-optic-service/
